questions.text: Which of the following describes the objective of financial statements according to the IASB Framework?
questions.explanation: To provide information about the financial position, performance and changes in financial position of an entity that is useful to a wide range of users in making economic decisions.

choices.label: A
choices.text: To show the market value of the entity.

choices.label: B
choices.text: To provide information useful to a wide range of users for economic decisions.

choices.label: C
choices.text: To assist management in daily operations.
